com.cognifide.qa.bb.proxy

Interface ProxyEventListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ProxyLogger, TrafficLogProvider

    public interface ProxyEventListener
    Classes implementing this interface and registered in the Guice are informed about events related to traffic analysis. Please notice that traffic analysis done by the TrafficAnalyzer class takes place in a new thread. Therefore, all ThreadLocal variables (eg. current test in the reporter module) may not work correctly. When the analysis is done, the dispatch() method is run in the thread starting the analysis.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void dispatch()
      Method called after listeningStopped by the original thread starting analysis.
      void listeningStarted()
      Method will be invoked when analysis is started.
      void listeningStopped(net.lightbody.bmp.core.har.Har har)
      Method will be invoked when analysis is finished.
      void requestFound()
      This method will be invoked if the analyzer finds request.
      void timeout()
      This method will be invoked if the analyzer doesn't find the request.
      void waitingForRequest(RequestPredicate predicate, ClosestHarEntryElector closestHarEntryElector)
      Method will be invoked after listeningStarted(), when the analyzer is waiting for desired request.

      • waitingForRequest

        void waitingForRequest(RequestPredicate predicate,
                       ClosestHarEntryElector closestHarEntryElector)
        Method will be invoked after listeningStarted(), when the analyzer is waiting for desired request.
        Parameters:
        predicate - RequestPredicate instance.
        closestHarEntryElector - object that can find closest object regarding predicate might be null value if predicate doesn't allow so
